Package org.apache.james.container.spring.adaptor

Interface Summary
ConfigurationProvider interface for providing a Avalon configuration to replace the default (legacy) mechanism implemented by AvalonConfigurationFileProvider
ServiceManagerFactory  
 

Class Summary
AvalonConfigurationFileProvider loads the well-known classic avalon/phoenix configuration file TODO make this thing be based on Resource class and inject resource.getInputStream() into InputSource
AvalonContext mimmicks the behavior of an Avalon context.
DefaultServiceManagerFactory provides a Avalon-style service manager to all components
FileSystemBridge  
LoggingBridge bridge to act as a Avalon logger but effectively forward to a some other logging service
